Prompt Library.use_case: Fast content creation for busy social media managers

prompts.title: Instagram Caption Generator
prompts.prompt: Write a friendly, engaging Instagram caption for a product photo of a handmade leather wallet. Emphasize craftsmanship, and include 3 relevant hashtags.

prompts.title: Twitter/X Thread Explainer
prompts.prompt: Create a 5-tweet educational thread explaining why CRM is essential for small businesses. Use casual tone, emojis, and a hook in the first tweet.

prompts.title: LinkedIn Post for Brand Story
prompts.prompt: Write a professional but personal LinkedIn post introducing a new hire and sharing why they joined our company's mission (software for remote teams).

prompts.title: TikTok Video Script
prompts.prompt: Create a short, catchy TikTok video script that shows how our app helps remote teams reduce Zoom fatigue. Include 3 scenes and a humorous twist.

prompts.title: Hashtag Brainstormer
prompts.prompt: Generate 10 engaging hashtags for a skincare brand running a summer glow campaign.

Prompt Library.use_case: Make email creation easy for marketing or sales folks

prompts.title: Cold Outreach Email
prompts.prompt: Write a short, professional cold email for a B2B SaaS company offering accounting automation for ecommerce stores.

prompts.title: Abandoned Cart Recovery
prompts.prompt: Create a friendly abandoned cart reminder email for a candle shop. Include a 10% discount incentive and urgency.

prompts.title: Newsletter Headline Ideas
prompts.prompt: Generate 5 catchy subject line options for this week's newsletter covering 3 new blog posts about productivity hacks.

prompts.title: Customer Onboarding Email
prompts.prompt: Write a welcome email for new users of our time tracking app. Keep it concise and highlight 3 next steps.

prompts.title: Win-back Campaign
prompts.prompt: Write a warm, conversational email to re-engage users who haven't opened emails in 30 days.

Prompt Library.use_case: Helping managers or ops people run smoother teams

prompts.title: Weekly Team Summary
prompts.prompt: Summarize this week's team updates from 3 bullet points per teammate into a professional 1-paragraph Slack post.

prompts.title: Meeting Agenda Builder
prompts.prompt: Create a 30-minute meeting agenda for our weekly check-in. Topics: project status, blockers, and next week goals.

prompts.title: Performance Review Draft
prompts.prompt: Write a constructive performance review summary for a junior designer. Highlight strengths and 2 suggested growth areas.

prompts.title: SOP Documentation Prompt
prompts.prompt: Write a standard operating procedure for onboarding a new customer to our software. Include 5 steps and best practices.

prompts.title: Time-Saving Email Template
prompts.prompt: Generate a reusable internal email template for requesting project updates from cross-functional teams.
